value.verse: Sing to the LORD a new song, *
value.halfverse: for he has done marvelous things.
has he won for himself the victory.
value.verse: With his right hand and his holy arm *
The LORD has made known his victory; *
value.halfverse: his righteousness has he openly shown in the sight of the nations.

value.verse: He remembers his mercy and faithfulness to the house of Israel, *
value.halfverse: and all the ends of the earth have seen the victory of our God.

value.verse: Shout with joy to the LORD, all you lands; *
value.halfverse: lift up your voice, rejoice, and sing.

value.verse: Sing to the LORD with the harp, *
value.halfverse: with the harp and the voice of song.

value.verse: With trumpets and the sound of the horn *
value.halfverse: shout with joy before the King, the LORD.

value.verse: Let the sea make a noise and all that is in it, *
value.halfverse: the lands and those who dwell therein.

and let the hills ring out with joy before the LORD,
 when he comes to judge the earth.
value.verse: Let the rivers clap their hands, *
In righteousness shall he judge the world *
